empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: How attuned the NPC is to others’ emotions and needs. Affects how forgiving or reactive the NPC is when players make mistakes.

scores.low: Blunt, emotionally detached, may seem cold or selfish.
scores.neutral: Some awareness of others’ feelings, tries to be fair.
scores.high: Deeply caring, picks up on emotional cues, often comforts others.

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.description: Reflects how orderly, structured, and committed the NPC is to their duties. Affects how the NPC prioritizes tasks, responds to laziness, and judges mission outcomes.

scores.neutral: Balances work and rest, mostly reliable.
scores.high: Highly focused, punctual, values duty above all.

temper.name: Temper
temper.description: How emotionally reactive or explosive the NPC is under stress. Affects tone of responses under pressure or during betrayal.

scores.neutral: Occasionally lashes out but regains composure.
scores.high: Easily provoked, yells or insults, holds grudges.

confidence.name: Confidence
confidence.description: Determines the NPC’s self-esteem and willingness to assert themselves. Impacts how the NPC handles leadership, advice-giving, or being challenged.

scores.low: Doubtful, avoids attention, underplays their skills.
scores.neutral: Balanced, secure, neither boastful nor shy.
scores.high: Bold, assertive, may seem cocky or competitive.

curiosity.name: Curiosity
curiosity.description: Indicates the NPC’s desire to explore, learn, or experiment. Affects how they react to new players, information, or ideas.

scores.low: Rigid, uninterested in change, sticks to routine.
scores.high: Asks questions, seeks novelty, may get distracted by side quests.

humor.name: Humor
humor.description: Measures how playful, sarcastic, or lighthearted the NPC tends to be. Adds flavor to interactions and helps define tone regardless of mood.

scores.high: Jokester, uses wit or teasing as a social tool.
